title: Rosena Allin-Khan – 2022 Comments on Fracking Vote
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rosena Allin-Khan, the Labour MP for Tooting, on Twitter on 19 October 2022.
content: This was in the Conservative Manifesto, it was Conservative policy, it’s a promise their MPs were elected on. But we witnessed Tory MPs being dragged in to vote against.
